headline: Does Slower Sales Growth Signal a Shift in Chipotle’s Long-Term Demand Story (CMG)?
summary: Earlier this week, Chipotle Mexican Grill reported third-quarter results that missed revenue estimates, as comparable sales grew only 0.3% and traffic declined 0.8% amid persistent inflation and softer demand, particularly among young and lower-income consumers. This slowdown reflects ongoing financial pressures on certain customer groups and a broader sector-wide softness affecting similar fast-casual restaurant chains. We will explore how the recent decline in customer traffic may...
